channel.title: Abyss Glider
channel.description: //NFT artists //Cyberpunk Fantasy story of the dying world //Crypto trading cards

item.turbo:content:
Abyss Glider

The ship to our universe
is leaving soon

What our project is about?

We are creating our own universe called “Elatu”, which will evolve during the NFT collections progression. In the future a board game based on our universe will be created, as well as two video games.

By purchasing our cards you will learn a little more about the universe, and you will also get a piece of the collection's plot, which you can collect to get an interesting story from the universe.

Our roadmap

  1. Developing smart contract
  2. Physical copy shipping
  3. Merchandise drop
  4. Creation of 3d models and shipping it with cards
  5. Shipping 3d models to our holders
  6. Start of parallel collection
  7. Merchandise drop 40 items
  8. Giveaway sponsor burning man trip
  9. Lauch of character constructor
  10. Board game work
  11. Comic draw and drop
